promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young simple bear dark-type wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or dark. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ursascryst, a chibi young simple bear dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: thief, baddy-bad. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word bear or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, bear-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Ursascryst is a mischievous chibi, skulking through castles searching for surprises. Watch out, as it will snatch up anything it pleases!
